about_the_game:
The Nuclear Option Original Soundtrack is an 17-track album, totalling 36 minutes of compelling instrumentation and spectacular solos by composers Jeremy Sahl and Justin Sahl. The soundtrack, which can be described as military rock, is uniquely driven by a combination of saxophone and electric guitar. This project will be ongoing and updated with the release of more tracks as Nuclear Option continues development.

This downloadable OST includes .mp3 as well as higher quality .flac and .wav versions of each track.
